div.p: Our Mission Education is the key to a full and productive life. The purpose of Halifax Elementary School is to foster a climate that honors education, encourages high academic standards, and respects cultural diversity. The intellectual, physical, social, and emotional needs of the elementary-level child are understood and each student’s learning style is supported and challenged.

p.a: The Flu: A Guide for Parents

div.p: Our initial plans of having a Parent Orientation, Screening and Open House are currently postponed until we have a better idea of when we will return back to school on May 4th.

What families can do at this point is complete the Kindergarten Registration Packet to the best of their ability. If you do not have the ability to print the registration packet from home, please email ekenney@slrsd.org or call 781-293-2581 the main office to request one be mailed to you directly. When you have a completed registration packet, you may either mail it to the school or hold on to the packet until our expected return to school on May 4th.
Please click here to view a list of the remaining school spirit days for the 2019 - 2020 school year.
Please click here to view the Grades 3-6 MCAS Schedule.
